page.title: 09Community schools - 1.
page.content: We visited the two community schools in our block and asked the same questions at each. Afterwards we compared the answers to see what was the same about them and where they differed. The ages of the people who use the community school range from 2 to 90, and people seem to travel to the nearest one. More than twice as many teachers work for the community school at Shevhngton as at Standish, and they are able to offer twice as many activities. The two schools offer completely different subjects in which people can take public examinations, except that typewriting can be taken at both. In each case all the school buildings are used by the community school.$
